backend/main.mo: Defines course, chapter, and lesson data structures with starter content and includes comparison utilities for sorting courses.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs for the exam‑prep platform with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files including pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, OKLCH color tokens, and light/dark theme variables for the app UI.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document setting up fonts, metadata, favicon, and loading the React app entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in a ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides a root layout with header, footer, and routed content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Renders the navigation bar with logo, links, search bar, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/QueryState.tsx: Reusable UI component for showing loading, error, or empty states in data‑fetching views.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: React footer component showing site info, quick links, contact details, and credits.
frontend/src/content/staticResources.ts: Exports a mapping of course IDs to lists of static PDF study resources.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identities, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useProgress.ts: Tracks lesson completion in localStorage with helpers to mark and check progress.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching courses, lessons, search results, and backend initialization.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration with custom color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point wiring React Query and Internet Identity provider around the main app.
frontend/src/pages/CourseDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed course info, chapters, lessons, and user progress using fetched course data.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Shows a filterable course list with progress indicators, using queries to fetch all or subject-filtered courses.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page displaying a hero section, subject shortcuts, and a featured course list loaded from backend with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/LessonViewerPage.tsx: Lesson viewer that loads a course, locates the current lesson, merges static and backend resources, and supports navigation and completion tracking.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Search page that queries lessons and filters courses by keyword, showing matching courses and lessons with loading and error states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the e-learning platform scope, features, image requirements, and architectural notes.
